subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bo Van Pelt moved to 11 under par to take a one-shot lead through eight holes of his third round at the Shell Houston Open, before play was suspended because of darkness. Fred Couples, Paul Casey, Colt Knost and Tommy Armour III were at 10 under when the horns sounded at 7:34 p.m.
